items.content_html: The NodeJS reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching and selective returns, and provides a modern alternative to REST.

items.content_html: Syncfusion Angular4 UI Components is a collection of modern TypeScript based true Angular Components. It has support for Ahead Of Time (AOT) compilation and Tree-Shaking. All the components are developed from the ground up to be lightweight, responsive, modular and touch friendly.
items.title: SyncfusionExamples/Syncfusion-angular4-ui-components: Syncfusion Angular4 UI Components is a collection of modern TypeScript based true Angular Components. It has support for Ahead Of Time (AOT) compilation and Tree-Shaking. All the components are developed from the ground up to be lightweight, responsive, modular and touch friendly.

items.content_html: "VfyJS is a sophisticated JavaScript library crafted to fortify projects. Its lightweight design offers a comprehensive solution for seamless value validation, ensuring data integrity and empowering developers with an advanced platform to effortlessly address diverse validation tasks in their projects."

Its lightweight design offers a comprehensive solution for seamless value validation, ensuring data integrity and empowering developers with an advanced platform to effortlessly address diverse validation tasks in their projects."
